text: nampikkai kontavarkalayinum, yutarkalayinum, kiristavarkalayinum, sapiyinkalayinum evarkal allahvaiyum, iruti nalaiyum unmaiyakave nampikkaikontu narceyalkalaic ceykirarkalo avarkalutaiya kuli avarkalutaiya iraivanitattil avarkalukku niccayamaka untu. Melum, avarkalukku evvitap payamum illai. Avarkal tukkappatavum mattarkal
